title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidery on damask
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cream-white damask embroidered with silk and metallic thread in a fantastic design of animals, insects and flowers.
